thread.title: Guys, it's time for you to put your quirky foot forward
thread.title_full: Guys, it's time for you to put your quirky foot forward

title: Guys, it's time for you to put your quirky foot forward
text:
Aditi Caroli, Hindustan Times , New Delhi | Updated: Jul 20, 2015 17:16 IST 
The style divas of Bollywood need to brace for some serious competition. From Salman Khan to Ranveer Singh to Farhan Akhtar, these fashion-forward men have stepped up their style game with striking, quirky footwear choices. Be it blingy kicks, sleek lace-up gladiators or painted canvas, these actors are having a fun time with their shoes. 
Go on, take instant inspo from this stylish gang, swap your boring black shoes for fun footwear, and race up the fashion ladder. Tags
